itunes:title: Episode 587 - Special Guest Former White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer
title: Episode 587 - Special Guest Former White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome former Trump White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer to discuss his time in the Trump White House and how President Trump operates differently from previous presidents, he shares his opinion on how well Trump has h...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome former Trump White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer to discuss his time in the Trump White House and how President Trump operates differently from previous presidents, he shares his opinion on how well Trump has handled the COVID-19 disaster, Spicer explains his theory on how VPs are chosen in Presidential campaigns, weighs in on the current 2020 candidates, and reveals who he believes will be candidates in the 2024 Presidential Campaign.

Sean Spicer's Charity: http://independencefund.org/

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome former Trump White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer to discuss his time in the Trump White House and how President Trump operates differently from previous presidents, he shares his opinion on how well Trump has handled the COVID-19 disaster, Spicer explains his theory on how VPs are chosen in Presidential campaigns, weighs in on the current 2020 candidates, and reveals who he believes will be candidates in the 2024 Presidential Campaign.

Sean Spicer's Charity: http://independencefund.org/
